flawed_nl_solution:
Toby has 6 friends because 33 / 0.55 = <<33/0.55=6>>6
45% of his friends are girls because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=45>>45
He has 2.7 friends who are girls because 6 x 0.45 = <<2.7=2.7>>2.7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 59.99999999999999, not 6.0. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
